Class FlappyBird

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • MovingImage
            • FlappyBird
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FlappyBird
extends MovingImage
    FlappyBird is moving image that represents the flappy bird, which can move up or down, lose stamina over a period of time, and gain stamina by eating food
    Author:
    sprihapandey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlappyBird(int x, int y)
      Constructs a flappy bird with given coordinates and a stamina of 10

      • FlappyBird

        public FlappyBird(int x,
                  int y)
        Constructs a flappy bird with given coordinates and a stamina of 10
        Parameters:
        x - The x - coordinate of the top left corner of the bird
        y - The y - coordinate of the top left corner of the bird

    • Method Detail

      • getStamina

        public int getStamina()
        Returns the value of the stamina of the bird
        Returns:
        the stamina of the bird

      • ate

        public boolean ate(Food f)
        Returns true and updates the stamina of the bird if it collides with the given Food object
        Parameters:
        f - The Food object the bird is checking collisions with
        Returns:
        true if the bird collides with the food, false otherwise

      • updateStamina

        public void updateStamina(int incr)
        Updates the stamina of the bird by the given amount
        Parameters:
        incr - the amount by which the stamina is increased

      • draw

        public void draw(FlappyBirdGame app,
                 boolean flapOn,
                 boolean diveOn,
                 int minHeight,
                 int maxHeight)
        Draws the rectangle representing the bird, moves it up or down if necessary, decreases the stamina of the bird, and makes sure the bird does not go out of the window
        Parameters:
        app - The game that uses the FlappyBird object
        flapOn - true if the bird needs to move up, false otherwise
        diveOn - true if the bird needs to move down, false otherwise
        minHeight - the minimum height the bird can dive down to
        maxHeight - the maximum height the bird can flap up to
